name: SCORM Objective Attempts
description: The SCORM Objective Attempts Brightspace Data Set outputs the score and completion information on every objective associated to the SCORM object where an attempt has been made. Returned Fields

columns.name: VisitId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the SCORM visit.

columns.name: AttemptNumber
columns.description: Number of the attempt on the objective.

columns.name: Score
columns.description: Number that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, scaled to between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: ScoreRaw
columns.description: Number that reflects the performance of the learner on this objective, relative to the min and max scores. Field can be null.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: Indicates whether the learner has mastered the objective (PASSED, FAILED, UNKNOWN). Field can be null.

columns.name: Completion
columns.description: Indicates whether the learner has completed the objective (COMPLETED, INCOMPLETE, UNKNOWN, NOT_ATTEMPTED, BROWSED). Field can be null.

columns.name: Progress
columns.description: How much of the objective was completed in this attempt, between 0 and 100. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModified
columns.description: Date when the activity was last modified (UTC).
